title: Tetsujin 28-gou (1980) (Dub)
alternative_title: The New Adventures of Gigantor, New Tetsujin 28-go, Tetsujin 28-go (1980), Tetsujin 28-go TV 2, New Gigantor, New Iron Man No.28, Tetsujin 28: Follower of the Sun, 鉄人２８号 (1980)
description: Shotaro had become an Interpol agent, working with Branch Robo, the antirobot crime unit of that organization. He still employs Tetsujin.
